summary.name: Professional Summary
summary.content: Product leader with more than 5 years leading fintech and ecommerce products for 30 M+ users and over 3 years shipping generative-AI solutions. At TrueML I delivered $3–5 M annualized uplift (33 % CVR, 19 % payment lift), led EcoCart’s post-purchase pivot to 24 % adoption and a 30-pt NPS jump, and now accelerate AI-powered MVPs through Builtit.dev.

items.position: Senior Product Manager, Live Trust & Safety (Contract via Avenue Code) | eBay
items.summary:
Lead Trust & Safety for eBay’s live-commerce platform, owning policy enforcement and seller safeguards.

  • Own end-to-end delivery of four initiatives (chat moderation, unpaid-item fraud, DSAR compliance, buyer/seller protections); removed ~30 % of critical blockers in month one.

  • Led seller-moderation controls that let hosts gate chat and buyer access; fast-tracked for upcoming eBay Live Tour events.

  • Set launch KPIs and partnered with Data Science to build dashboards for harmful-content rate, moderation latency, and unpaid-item rate, protecting eBay Live’s $19.5 B quarterly GMV.

  • Drove product decisions and approval cycles for Live Seller Console and checkout upgrades, cutting approval time from 3 weeks to 10 days.

Founded a micro-agency that ships AI-powered MVPs end to end for non-technical founders.

  • Validated demand via 25 founder interviews and launched two pilot builds using a reusable component + automation playbook, cutting build time from weeks to days.

Drove new product direction and prototyped package protection at a post-purchase e-commerce startup. Launched a revenue-share GTM to increase merchant adoption.

  • Established package protection as the next revenue pillar through 10+ merchant interviews, partner evaluations, and data analysis; defined MVP and led engineering & design for prototype.

  • Launched Shopify revenue-share pilot, securing 24 % adoption in month one and lifting NPS from 35 to 65.

  • Prototyped LLM-driven claims triage, demonstrating a 40 % reduction in manual review for early CS workflow testing.

Owned core payment product for a consumer-debt platform. Ran 30+ A/B tests and led MFA rollout to boost conversion and compliance.

  • Partnered with Eng, Data Science & Design to scale A/B testing to 30+ tests/quarter, driving $3–5 M annualized uplift (33 % CVR, 19 % payment lift).

  • Integrated richer behavioral data for ML segmentation, lifting plan selection by 12 % and engagement by 34 %.

  • Led mobile-first redesign, reducing average checkout time by 15 s and contributing to a 19 % payment lift.

Built product ops & support org from scratch at a pre-PM fintech startup.

  • Established support SLAs and Looker dashboards, cutting first response time from 24 h to <4 h and maintaining 4.6/5 CSAT.

  • Launched targeted HubSpot email & Twilio SMS campaigns, driving +25 % MAU.

  • Designed BI dashboards for real-time support KPIs, reducing agent handle time by 12 %.

Partnered with founders on 0→1 products: discovery, scoping, and delivery.

  • ProgForce: Rapid-prototyped gamified forecasting UX, boosting participation from 40 % to 70 % in tests.

  • AssemblyDrop: Defined marketplace MVP, piloting with 5 crews and 1,000+ SKUs onboarded.

items.name: DebtCat (Founder/Builder)
items.description: Independently developed and launched an AI powered consumer debt rights platform (Next.js, OpenAI API, Stripe, PostGrid) featuring an educational chatbot and automated dispute letter generation. Demonstrates end to end product creation for a real user need.

items.name: FindMe.pet (Founder/Builder)
items.description: Launched an AI pet adoption matching platform (Next.js, Petfinder API, OpenAI API) designed to reduce shelter return rates by analyzing lifestyle compatibility. Showcases AI application to solve a passion driven problem.

css.value: @media print { body { font-size: 10px !important; line-height: 1.2 !important; margin: 0 !important; padding: 0 !important; } .header { margin-top: 0 !important; padding-top: 0 !important; } .section { margin-bottom: 6px !important; padding: 0 !important; } .experience-item, .project-item { margin-bottom: 4px !important; } ul { margin: 2px 0 !important; padding-left: 16px !important; } li { margin-bottom: 1px !important; } .skills-section { margin-bottom: 2px !important; } h1, h2, h3 { margin: 0 0 4px 0 !important; } } body { font-size: 11px !important; line-height: 1.3 !important; } .section { margin-bottom: 8px !important; } .experience-item, .project-item { margin-bottom: 6px !important; } ul { margin: 4px 0 !important; } li { margin-bottom: 2px !important; } .skills-section { margin-bottom: 4px !important; }
